summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2401, for the improvement of 20th Avenue Northeast from East 50th Street to East 56th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks thereon, under Ordinance No. 25164 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
